title: Add bicubicSpline Stream Evaluator
description:
This ticket adds the bicupicSpline Stream Evaluator to support computing bicubic splines over a matrix.

Implementation provided by Apache Commons Math

comments.content: Added patch with initial implementation and tests.
comments.author: Joel Bernstein
